== Introduction ==
The Marketing Strike Force, or MSF, is purposed to provide a public face to the <nowiki>[[UbuntuMediaCenterTeam|Ubuntu Media Center]]</nowiki> project. The primary areas of activity include authoring website content, production of announcements, and interacting with other projects or parties on behalf of the UMC Team.

== Current Activities ==
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntumediacenter.org/|Website]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/Website|Planning]]</nowiki> and Implementation
* Forming Documentation and Translation Teams
* Recruitment
* Community Reports
